participant_1.name: Aarav Sharma
participant_1.personality: Free-spirited and adventurous, Aarav loves to explore new ideas and experiences, often challenging traditional norms.
participant_1.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.personality: Michael is practical and detail-oriented, with a strong passion for technology and sports, balancing family life with work.
participant_2.background: i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i'm a male. i've a children and a dogs.
